edge: Ranveer Singh played the role of Bajirao I, who was the Peshwa of the Maratha Empire and also married Kashibai and Mastani.
Deepika Padukone portrayed Mastani, who was Bajirao I's second wife.
In the movie, Priyanka Chopra acted as Kashibai, who was Bajirao I's first wife and also mother of Nana Saheb and Ragunath.
Tanvi Azmi portrayed Radhabai, who was Bajirao I's mother.
Milind Soman played Ambaji Pant Purandare in the movie.
In the film, Vaibhav Tatwawaadi acted as Chimaji Appa, who was Bajirao I's younger brother.
Ayush Tandon portrayed Nana Saheb, who was Kashibai and Bajirao I's first son.
In the movie, Rudra Soni played the role of Young Nana Saheb.
Mahesh Manjrekar acted as Chhatrapati Shahu in the movie.
Aditya Pancholi portrayed Shripatrao Pratinidhi in the movie.
In the film, Raza Murad played the role of Asaf Jah I, who was the Nizam of Hyderabad.
In the movie, Sukhada Khandkekar acted as Anubai.
Benjamin Gilani portrayed Maharaja Chhatrasal in the movie.
In the film, Anuja Sathe acted as Bhiubai.
Yatin Karyekar portrayed Krishna Bhatt in the movie.
In the film, Ganesh Yadav acted as Malhar Rao Holkar.
In the movie, Snehlata Girish Vasaikar acted as Bhanu.
In the movie, Irrfan Khan provided voice-over for the narrator's role.
In the film, Kaartik Ahuja played Nasir Jung's role.
